values.short_description: Agile Development plugin activated without Agile Development 2.0
Workflow(s) should not be checked out for an extended time
Custom Tables in global scope
Workflow activity references an empty or invalid group.
Custom Tables Created for scoped application > 5
Scoped app uses logging utils or depreciated methods for logging rather than the verbosity method.
Enable and use Application Administration is activated
current.update() in script workflow activity
Add related list "Catalog Item to KB Links" when knowledge is needed on a record producer
Remove HR role from IT System Administrator
Roles that can view email in the Activity formatter when including "Sent/Received Emails" should include HR Agents
HR Tables not excluded on clones from Prod
Do not change the Restricted Caller Access Records
Enable impersonate check
Assignment Groups with no active users
Change Task mandatory fields
Check for unhandled duplicate CIs
CMDB Health is enabled/utilized
Business Services do not have Owner and Assigned To fields populated.
Support group's Group email and Manager fields are empty.
Applications should use Source Control
JavaScript Mode is not set on ES5
Knowledge Widget without a Manage Document mapped to Catalog Item
User profile should have a professional photo
Knowledge Widget without a Knowledge Article mapped to Catalog Item
Update the Company/Logo on your Service Portal
No Major Incident trigger rules in place.
Core fields to be read-only.
Remove '5-Planning' from Incident Priority
Use state, not Incident State or Problem State
Mandatory fields for incident management
Related lists on Incident form
Knowledge articles older than 12 months may be unduly aging
Activate 'Can Read' and 'Cannot read' fields on Knowledge Article form

Every Knowledge Base should have at least one Category defined.
Articles that should have been made inactive are still accessible in the KB
Knowledge Article Categories
Can Contribute / Cannot Contribute user criteria to be defined on each knowledge base
Obfuscate fields in snapshot saved during background process on mobile application if instance contains sensitive information
Use Notification Categories
Enable IP Range Based Authentication
Duplicate foundation/core data found.
Before Business Rules should not update() or insert() records on other tables
Scripts should not contain hard-coded IDs
Performance Monitoring ACL should be enabled
Differs from baseline: Business Rules
Week day schedules should have holiday excludes
Number maintenance fields unique
Tables without ACLs
No glide.canvas.grid.widget_performance_threshold value set.
Disable SQL error messages
Same field twice on one form
User does not get all the roles assigned to them after being added to a group that has the roles
Scripts should not directly call Java packages
Client-side code should not contain the console.log() debugging method
Lots of active tasks more than a month old
More than 10 workflows for a table (excluding sc_request)
Allow ServiceNow employees to access the instance only through secured set of IP ranges
Differs from baseline: UI Macros and UI Pages
Client Scripts should check for isLoading and return
Unnecessary dot walking to sys_id on ACR scan
Active Scheduled Job run by Deleted User

Fav icon not changed
Run scheduled jobs as a specified user account or as system
Enable Multi-factor authentication

Long running (slow) scripts
Too many fields on a form
Active task with Closed Date

Groups with no users

Specify group types
Enable Privacy on Client-Callable Script Includes
Use UI Policies Instead of Client Scripts
Activity Formatter placement
Server-side code should not use GlideRecord.getRowCount() to count records
It is recommended to enable CSRF Strict Validation
Hard coded instance URL
Duplicate task numbers

Applications or modules are not protected by roles

Don't use a variable called gr in scripts
Debug properties should be disabled in production
Do not query audit log in your custom integrations and code.

XML External Entity Processing - Validation
Use the condition field in Business Rules
Script Includes with duplicate names

Business Service or CI field mandatory.

Number of Related Lists on Project Form

Catalog UI Policies - Default Mandatory Variable
Catalog Items should have at least a Name and a Short description
Catalog items whose meta field contains keywords can improve the search result when a user search for a catalog item by a keyword.
Avoid using non-internationalised strings in HTML templates.
Consider using c.server.get() to only pass in the data the server needs, instead of passing everything with c.server.update()
Remove unused services from client script.
Use the "controller as" syntax.
Avoid 2-way AngularJS bindings {​{options.myVar}} for the non-dynamic options variables, use one-way instead {​{::options.myVar}}
Use AngularJS services rather than window objects.
The validation vulnerability scan should only be configured to launch once the scanner appliance is configured
